Interface CredentialsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryCredentialsManager, SharedPreferencesCredentialsManager

    • Method Detail

      • setTokenDetails

        void setTokenDetails(java.lang.String tokenString)
                     throws JSONException
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • clearCredentials

        void clearCredentials()
        Removes the credentials from the SharedPreferences as well as the NetworkProvider static string objects.

      • checkCredentialsAndCopyToNetworkProvider

        boolean checkCredentialsAndCopyToNetworkProvider()
        Checks if all required credentials exist. If so, updates the value of the appropriate NetworkProvider static string objects.
        Returns:
        true of all credentials exist, false otherwise.

      • getExpiresIn

        int getExpiresIn()
        Returns:
        the expires in integer or -1 if it does not exist.

      • getExpiresAt

        java.lang.String getExpiresAt()
        Returns:
        the expires in string value or null if it does not exist.

      • getRefreshToken

        java.lang.String getRefreshToken()
        Returns:
        the refresh token string or null if it does not exist.
